Hi,
  I am new to cantera and although i went through the steps of
installa=
tion properly, i am still unsure if i have completely
installed cantera. I =
installed python, numpy and then ran the cantera
self installer .msi file a=
nd then ran the .exe cantera file from the
cantera folder. I am able to run=
 matlab demos but am unable to run the
C++ version. Do i need to build cant=
era like some of the docs suggest
using VC++ .NET. Also is the same build p=
ossible using Visual Studio
6? One other question is on using wall velocity=
 for the reactor. I am
unable to get this to work in matlab (specify the ve=
locity as a
fourier function). Does anybody know any sample code for this. =
Would
be of immense help. Thanks in advance, shyam.
